items.title: NEC raakt Shiogai voor miljoenen kwijt aan Wolfsburg
items.summary: NEC ziet Kento Shiogai op korte termijn vertrekken. De Nijmeegse club wilde deze winter eigenlijk niet meewerken aan een transfer van de twintigjarige spits, maar VfL Wolfsburg activeert een clausule in het contract van de Japanner. Voor een gelimiteerde afkoopsom van tien miljoen euro kan Shiogai overstappen naar de Bundesliga-club.

items.title: 'Ter Stegen maakt het seizoen af bij Girona'
items.summary: Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen maakt het seizoen af bij Girona. Dat melden vooraanstaande transferjournalisten vrijdagavond. De doelman wordt voor de rest van het seizoen gehuurd van streekgenoot Barcelona.

items.title: Igor Thiago: ‚ÄòThe only thing I know how to do in my life is score goals‚Äô
items.summary: Brentford‚Äôs record-breaking Brazilian has overcome a torrid childhood, racism and injuries ‚Äì but is dreaming of Brazil‚Äôs No 9 shirt at the World Cup Igor Thiago had dreams that seemed impossible. His impoverished childhood and the early death of his father forced him to grow up fast while still a teenager. To eat, he had to start working as a child. He was a bricklayer‚Äôs assistant, a fruit carrier at the market and a car washer ‚Ä¶ so many jobs that could have prevented him from becoming the Brazilian to make Premier League history with the most goals in a single season. Igor Thiago has 16 goals in 21 games for Brentford. There are still 17 more matches to go, the first against Chelsea on Saturday, but he has already surpassed such Brazilian luminaries as Roberto Firmino, Matheus Cunha and Gabriel Martinelli, all of whom scored 15 league goals in their most prolific season. How to describe this turnaround in his life? Igor Thiago has an easy explanation. ‚ÄúI would describe it as a lot of hard work. I think that everything God has planned for my life, has given me this year at Brentford, is something I hadn‚Äôt experienced yet in my career,‚Äù he says. Continue reading...

items.title: PSV in de beker tegen Heerenveen, kraker in Alkmaar
items.summary: Vrijdag is er geloot voor de kwartfinale van de beker. Op het eerste gezicht is AZ - FC Twente het mooiste affiche. Kampioen PSV krijgt SC Heerenveen op bezoek, titelverdediger Go Ahead Eagles moet naar Telstar.

items.title: Manchester United‚Äôs Michael Carrick brushes off Keane‚Äôs pre-derby jibe
items.summary: Irishman fell out with Lisa Carrick after 2014 criticism ‚ÄòIt is the way of the world,‚Äô says new interim head coach Michael Carrick has shrugged off Roy Keane‚Äôs jibe regarding his wife ‚Äúprobably doing the team talk‚Äù at Manchester United by claiming it does not bother him. Keane made the comment about Lisa Carrick after the 44-year-old‚Äôs appointment as United head coach until the end of the season. Speaking on the Stick to Football podcast, the Irishman was responding to Jamie Carragher‚Äôs comment that United should not have employed Carrick in the role. ‚ÄúWell, his wife can always come in because she‚Äôs got a bit of a big mouth sometimes. She‚Äôs probably doing the team talk,‚Äù Keane said. Continue reading...

items.title: Rose Lavelle named U.S. women's player of year
items.summary: Gotham FC and United States women's national team midfielder Rose Lavelle has been voted U.S. Soccer's Female Player of the Year for 2025.

items.title: Pulisic stays on bench as Rabiot inspires Milan win
items.summary: AC Milan won 3-1 at in-form Como on Thursday, with Adrien Rabiot winning a penalty and then scoring two goals.

items.summary: Liverpool goalkeeper Rafaela Borggrafe receives a six-game ban for using discriminatory language towards a team-mate.

items.title: Former Man Utd players' comments 'irrelevant' - Carrick
items.summary: Michael Carrick brands the noise generated around Manchester United by former players "irrelevant" and says Roy Keane's personal comments did not bother him.

Liverpool‚Äôs Rafaela Borggr√§fe given six-game ban after FA finds she made racist remark
items.summary: Goalkeeper has served five matches of the suspension Reference to skin colour overheard by club colleagues The Liverpool goalkeeper Rafaela Borggr√§fe was given a six-game ban by the Football Association after being found to have made a racist comment that involved reference to skin colour. Borggr√§fe has served five matches of that suspension. She accepted the sanction and was also ordered to enrol on an education programme after an FA investigation into the language, which was overheard by some staff and teammates. Continue reading...

items.title: Oliver Glasner confirms he will leave Crystal Palace role in summer
items.summary: Austrian has been linked with Manchester United job Manchester City close on deal to sign Gu√©hi from Palace Oliver Glasner has confirmed he will leave Crystal Palace at the end of this season, having informed the chair, Steve Parish, in October that he wanted a new challenge, and said the captain, Marc Gu√©hi, is on the verge of joining Manchester City. The Austrian, who led Palace to their first major trophy when they won the FA Cup last season, is out of contract in the summer and has been linked with Manchester United in recent weeks. Glasner said last week he was planning further talks with Parish to resolve his future but revealed in the buildup to Palace‚Äôs game at Sunderland on Saturday that he would be leaving the club. Continue reading...
